General.Name: Sharda Motor Industries Limited
General.Description: Sharda Motor Industries Limited manufactures, assembles, trades in, and sells auto components to automobiles and electronics original equipment manufacturers in India. The company offers exhaust systems for passenger vehicles, commercial vehicles, tractors, and generators; and suspensions systems, such as arm lower control comp, upper arm assy, rear and front suspension, front axle assy, and assy lower link complete RH products. It also provides seating frames and trims, frame comp front cushions, hinge assly rear backs, frame comp front and rear backs, and frame comp risers, as well as catalytic convertors, sheet metal components, and plastic parts. The company also exports its products. Sharda Motor Industries Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: D-188, Okhla Industrial Area, New Delhi, India, 110020
